item.title: EVE-NG Quick Setup Guide
item.description: What is EVE-NG? EVE-NG is an amazing tool that should be included in any aspiring/current IT engineers toolbelt. It allows you to create and emulate large scale network/server topologies! Download EVE-NG VM Configuration VMware Workstation Player Vmware Workstation Player is a free type-two hypervisor created by VMware that allows you to configure and run virtual machines on directly on top of your local computers pre-existing operating system. This is perfect for the simple home-lab environment.
